mapper.sql: SELECT csp.ID id, csp.CRAFWORK_NAME crafworkName, csp.MAC_TYPE macType, csp.IS_CHECK isCheck, csp.QUARTERS_EMP quartersEmp, csp.GRADE_EMP gradeEmp, csp.UNIT unit, csp.DELETED deleted, csp.COMPANY_ID companyId, csp.CREATE_TIME createTime, csp.CREATE_BY createBy, csp.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, csp.MODIFY_BY modifyBy, qh.quarters_desc quarterName
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM CRAFWORK_STRUCT_PLM csp left join hcm.quarters_hcm qh on csp.QUARTERS_EMP = qh.quarters_no and qh.company_id = csp.company_id and qh.deleted = 'F'

FROM CRAFWORK_STRUCT_PLM csp left join hcm.quarters_hcm qh on csp.QUARTERS_EMP = qh.quarters_no and qh.company_id = csp.company_id and qh.deleted = 'F'
order by csp.id desc

SELECT cp.id id, cp.crafwork_name crafworkName, cp.unit unit, cp.quarters_emp quartersEmp, qh.quarters_desc quarterName FROM crafwork_struct_plm cp left join hcm.quarters_hcm qh on cp.quarters_emp = qh.quarters_no and cp.company_id = qh.company_id and qh.deleted = 'F' WHERE cp.id NOT IN (SELECT tp.crafwork_id FROM prod_crafwork_path_plm tp WHERE tp.mid_prod_no = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cp.company_id = tp.company_id AND tp.deleted = 'F') AND cp.deleted = 'F' AND cp.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY cp.create_time DESC

SELECT cp.id id, cp.crafwork_name crafworkName, cp.unit unit, cp.quarters_emp quartersEmp, qh.quarters_desc quarterName FROM crafwork_struct_plm cp left join hcm.quarters_hcm qh on cp.quarters_emp = qh.quarters_no and cp.company_id = qh.company_id and qh.deleted = 'F' WHERE cp.id NOT IN (SELECT tp.crafwork_id FROM prod_crafwork_path_plm tp WHERE tp.mid_prod_no = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tp.path_no = #{pathNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cp.company_id = tp.company_id AND tp.deleted = 'F') AND cp.deleted = 'F' AND cp.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
